title: How self-care helps you lose weight
itunes:title: How self-care helps you lose weight
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Self-care is often misunderstood. We think it's mani's, massages, and pedi's. Well, those things are awesome but most of us can't wait for the day we have the time and money to do it. Today's episode is all about how to take care of yourself so you can lose weight. I give you the "unfancy" ways to care for your body, the shortcuts of self-care that take NO TIME to implement, and how to use self-care techniques to raise your self-esteem.
